Summary I am graduating this Fall and actively looking for a Full Time Role in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, Data Science. 
My current research interests are using Deep Learning and Machine Learning for Natural Language Processing to better represent data and enhance the current systems. 
 
Currently, I have been using Deep Convolutional Neural Networks , Recursive Neural Networks and other architectures for better word embeddings and enhancing State of Art Sentiment Analysis . 
 
I am passionate coder interested in learning new technologies on Big Data and Search. 
Prior to this I have 2 years of experience working as a Data Engineer in areas which include Distributed Systems, Cloud Computing, Web Services, Big Data and Algorithms, Search Engines. I am passionate about using data with Machine Learning Algorithms. 
 
 
Here is my recent Project on Deep Learning which one the Best Project .  
 
URL for the Poster

[accepted EMNLP2015] Graduate Student Georgia Institute of Technology August 2014  – Present (1 year 1 month) Greater Atlanta Area Graduate Student Deep Learning Summer School, Univ of Montreal August 2015  –  August 2015  (1 month) Montreal, Canada Area Presented Poster on Sentence and User Representation Learning using Twitter Data Data Scientist - Machine Learning - Data & Fundamentals Microsoft May 2015  –  August 2015  (4 months) Greater Seattle Area Topic Modeling and Deep Learning Techniques for Upgrade Sentiment for Short and Long Text.

Grading Assignments 
Weekly office hours to answer student doubts Software Engineer - IC2 Edifecs April 2014  –  August 2014  (5 months) Mohali Associate Software Developer Edifecs June 2012  –  March 2014  (1 year 10 months) CHANDIGARH Developing ETL(Extract Transform Load) on clinical data using STORM framework,MongoDB and applying inside into Patient Record using ExtJS. 
 
Contributing to the development of Edifecs Private Cloud framework [PaaS] for deploying, monitoring and interacting with Edifecs Product Suites and Services in multi-node cluster. 
Worked on developing HDM: Distributed real-time search, which is used to Archive Cold Data and providing search on top of that data using the metadata associated with that data(Google like search + Structure Query) with help of Elastic Search 
 
Working on Big Data Analytics using latest technologies like Hadoop, Hive, Hbase, Cassandra ] for Big Data problems related to US Health Industry 
Writing advanced Map-Reduce jobs for Hadoop, Hbase and Cassandra. Software Development Intern at Microsoft Corporation Microsoft May 2011  –  July 2011  (3 months) Hyderabad Area, India Making a tool for measuring and improving the quality of PDFuzzer. 
 
I worked under RFX group and designed a tool [Fuzz-Meter]to determine the quality of a fuzzer , which also has the ability to reconfigure the variable of the Fuzzer to get the Fuzzer with the maximum code coverage . 
 
Enhanced the features of PDF Object of our fuzzer by implementing cloning of the Complete PDF in our fuzzer which helped in increasing the efficiency of the Fuzzer on the whole.

Summary Senior Architect, having a decade of blended experience in Mobile, Wireless & Finance domain.  
 
Experience in Enterprise Performance Engineering Consulting (Mobile & Server - Performance, Security, Network), iOS / Android Native and Hybrid applications - Development, Client-Server & Thick client apps development, Strategy & Roadmap, Non Linear Revenue - Product development, R&D and Innovation and Business Development. 
 
Has been Instrumental in creating new offering & capabilities on Mobile Performance Engg., Security Assessment, Network Performance & Accessibility testing and creating Business Model with strong R&D of 2.5+ years.  
  
Good Experience in : 
 
• E2E Enterprise Performance Engineering Consulting (both Server & Mobile Performance Engineering) 
• Mobile NFR consulting (Apps Performance Engineering & Network Performance) 
• Mobile Apps - Security Assessment (OWASP Top 10) & Secure SDLC implementation. 
• iOS, Android Native and Hybrid applications - Development 
• Strategy & Roadmap 
• Thick client apps development using C/C++/VC++/MFC/ATL/.NET/C#,multi-threaded prog. 
• Non Linear Revenue - Product development 
• Driving R&D and Innovation 
• Cellular platform tools development 
• Managing client interactions and Business development 
• People management, Project management 
 
Products Development Experience : 
  
• Remote Phone Controller- a tool that can enable a user to control a remotely located phone. Re-factored, re-architected & implemented the server, so that App dev / drivers / testing team members are able to view the screen & work with remote phone and execute desired scripts & operations. 
 
• Responsible for system architecture, design & development of Android handset flashing strategy & tool, conceptualized platform hardware integration tool strategy for the white labelled phone initiative. 
 
• Productised, development and enhancement of Intranet - client/server project for the Products based on Non - Linear Revenue model. Summary Senior Architect, having a decade of blended experience in Mobile, Wireless & Finance domain.

Experience Software Engineer (IC2) Oracle India August 2012  – Present (3 years 1 month) Bangalore I have worked on Retail Products like RWMS and RMS. Interested to learn and implement new technologies at work. Software Engineer IGEFI Software India Pvt Ltd (Multifonds) May 2010  –  August 2012  (2 years 4 months) Bangalore Worked as a Software Engineer with Igefi Software India Pvt Ltd, Bangalore 
IGEFI headquartered in Luxembourg specializes in the development and implementation of software application products to support the processing of various Financial Funds, for example Mutual Funds,Pension Funds, Insurance companies and other Investment Funds. It develops and supports two separate products for Fund Processing:- 
1. Multifonds Fund Administration Software (including accounts) 
2. Multifonds Transfer Agent. 
I was worked extensively in Multifonds Transfer Agent product. Software Engineer Exilant Technologies Private Limited March 2007  –  May 2010  (3 years 3 months) Bangalore/Odisha I Joined Exilant as a software engineer trainee and after 6 months promoted as a software engineer. 
I worked in Indian Railway projects for 1 year and then worked in Apple(Apple Inc) projects for rest of the time. Software Engineer Virtual Labs, IIIT Hyderabad June 2010  –  July 2012  (2 years 2 months) Hyderabad Area, India Virtual Labs is an initiative by Ministry of Human Resource Development(MHRD) in India to provide remote-access to Labs in various disciplines of Science and Engineering.
